channel.title: Comments on: Back it Like it’s Hot: Bend Inventor Debuts Fireside Audiobox on Kickstarter

item.title: By: Spurred by Giant Order, Fireside Audiobox Now Ready for Mass Production | StartupBend
item.dc:creator: Spurred by Giant Order, Fireside Audiobox Now Ready for Mass Production | StartupBend
item.description: […] If you attended this year’s unConference, then you probably saw runner-up Tyrone Hazen’s amazing invention, the Fireside Audiobox. Tyrone introduced his wireless speaker with flames that dance to the music at the conference. He was off the heels of a successful Kickstarter, which raised $38,000 last summer. […]
item.content:encoded: […] If you attended this year’s unConference, then you probably saw runner-up Tyrone Hazen’s amazing invention, the Fireside Audiobox. Tyrone introduced his wireless speaker with flames that dance to the music at the conference. He was off the heels of a successful Kickstarter, which raised $38,000 last summer. […]

item.title: By: Lisa Sipe
item.dc:creator: Lisa Sipe
item.description: You are so right Kelly! I didn't know I needed the Fireside Audiobox but now I must have it!
item.content:encoded: You are so right Kelly! I didn’t know I needed the Fireside Audiobox but now I must have it!
